data.name: Destiny HERO - Drawhand
data.desc: If this card is Special Summoned by the effect of a "HERO" monster: You can make each player draw 1 card. During the next Standby Phase after this card was sent to the GY: You can Special Summon this card from your GY, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Destiny HERO - Drawhand" once per turn.

card_sets.set_name: 2020 Tin of Lost Memories Mega Pack
